QuestData.Title: Specimen Request
QuestData.Description: Kyparite worms have shown extreme adaptations in order to mimic the environment around them. They can also grow to immense sizes at rates which are nearly unheard of for most creatures.$B$BTheir physiology could provide valuable insight into further mutations.$B$BBring me sample shards from the muck tunnelers in the shallows near Zan'vess.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 6 Kyparite Shards from Muck Tunnelers in The Briny Muck.
